mapper.insert: insert into odc.review (program_progSeq, user_userNumber, reviewDate, reviewRate, likeCount, reviewComment, uploadLocation) values (#{program_progSeq}, #{user_userNumber}, now(), #{reviewRate}, #{likeCount}, #{reviewComment}, #{uploadLocation})
mapper.delete: delete from odc.review where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber}
mapper.update: update odc.review set reviewDate = now(), reviewRate = #{reviewRate}, reviewComment = #{reviewComment}, uploadLocation = #{uploadLocation} where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM odc.review where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq};
SELECT AVG(reviewRate) FROM odc.review where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq};
SELECT * FROM odc.review where program_progSeq = #{program_progSeq} and user_userNumber = #{user_userNumber}
